text: Sir Olaf Caroe (or in full, Olaf Kirkpatrick Kruuse Caroe), KCSI, KCIE (1892-1981) was an administrator in 'British India. He remained Governor of the North-West Frontier Province from 1945 to 1947. Category:1892 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Colonial officials of British India
title: Olaf Caroe
